import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Users() { const reports=[ { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, { title:'فرهاد زارع', num:'29563', phone:'09104803777', date:'1400/03/01', cost:'5/000/00', }, ] return (
{ reports.map((item,i)=>{ return(

{item.title}

{item.num}

{item.phone}

{item.date}

{item.cost}

) }) }
) }
